data.title: Safety Deposit Boxes
data.solution:
order = input().split(",")
specific_item = input()
print(5 * order.index(specific_item) + 5)
data.statement:
John is robbing a bank, but he is not taking everything. He is looking for a specific item in the safety deposit boxes and he is going to drill into each one in order to find his required item. Once he finds his required item he can make his escape, but how long will it take him to get to that item?
Determine the amount of time in minutes, it will take for him to find the item he is looking for if it takes him 5 minutes to drill into each box.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
gold,diamonds,documents,Declaration of Independence,keys
Declaration of Independence

data.stubGenerator:
read order:string(100)
read specificItem:string(100)
write Time taken to drill through the required item
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: A string that represents the items in each box that will be drilled in order (items are separated by a comma)
<<Line 2>>: A string of which item John is looking for.
data.outputDescription: An integer of the amount of time in minutes it will take for John to find his required item.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

John is robbing a bank, but he is not taking everything. He is looking for a specific item in the safety deposit boxes and he is going to drill into each one in order to find his required item. Once he finds his required item he can make his escape, but how long will it take him to get to that item?
Determine the amount of time in minutes, it will take for him to find the item he is looking for if it takes him 5 minutes to drill into each box.
Input
Line 1: A string that represents the items in each box that will be drilled in order (items are separated by a comma)
Line 2: A string of which item John is looking for.
Output
An integer of the amount of time in minutes it will take for John to find his required item.
Constraints
Example
Input
gold,diamonds,documents,Declaration of Independence,keys
Declaration of Independence
Output
20
